meta.title: Fresher's Party 2025 | College Events
meta.description: A night of fun, food, and friendship to welcome our new students on November 15, 2025.

about.title: About The Party
description: Get ready for an unforgettable night dedicated to our newest members! The annual Fresher's Party is a long-standing tradition where senior students officially welcome the first-year batch into the college family.

The evening is packed with exciting ice-breaker games, a talent show where freshers can showcase their skills, and the crowning of Mr. & Ms. Fresher 2025. The night concludes with a delicious dinner followed by a DJ night where everyone can hit the dance floor.

highlights.title: Last Year's Party
highlights.caption: A look back at the fun and excitement of the 2024 Fresher's Party.

categories.title: Fun & Games
categories.description: Engaging activities to break the ice.

categories.title: Talent Show
categories.description: Discover the hidden talents of the new batch.

categories.title: Mr. & Ms. Fresher
categories.description: The most anticipated title of the night.

categories.title: DJ Night
categories.description: Dance the night away with your new friends.

articles.title: Welcome Freshers! Party Announced!
articles.excerpt: Get ready for a night of fun, food, and friendship as we welcome our new students.

questions.question: Is this event only for first-year students?
questions.answer: Yes, this event is exclusively to welcome our new batch of first-year students. Entry is restricted to them.

questions.question: Is there a dress code?
questions.answer: The dress code is smart casuals. Dress to impress!
